text: Nilda Pedrosa (1974 â€“ January 23, 2021) was an American Republican politician. She was the acting United States Under Secretary of State for Public Diplomacy and Public Affairs from September 28, 2020, until a few days before her death in January 2021. She was the Assistant Dean for Development & External Affairs at Florida International University College of Law. Pedrosa was born in Miami, Florida. Pedrosa died on January 23, 2021 in Miami from cancer, aged 46. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians from Miami Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Cancer deaths in Florida
title: Nilda Pedrosa
